Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory346.jpg'}
{3: 'Echo breaths heavily beside you, struggling. Even with your help, the effects of the interferences on her M.I.N.D. are still going to take some time before they wear off.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Why... would that thing show up here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Should we retreat to the conservation area?', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'I... can still fight.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'With the ambush here, we now know that the destruction of Conservation Area 112 must be related to Utopia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Stick to our route, and we should arrive in Conservation Area 112 tomorrow morning.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "There's an abandoned outpost ahead of us. Let's rest there tonight...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Echo explains her arrangements, your terminal suddenly rings.'}
{3: 'You open the terminal to find new announcements from Babylonia, the first of which is...'}
{2: 'Former Iris Warbler member Lena is suspected of defecting?', 3: '18'}
{3: 'Under the announcement is a blurry photo in which a figure stands next to the armor holding Echo...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: "Lena didn't defect or collude with any defector!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo frowns and interrupts you angrily.'}

{2: 'Echo', 3: 'That Construct... was indeed the one who took Cecily and me away from Constellia. He saved me because he believed I had the potential to become a Transcendant, but we parted way after I regained consciousness.', 4: '1'}
{3: "If Echo wanted to take revenge on Kurono while being hunted by both Babylonia and Utopia's Aurora Squadron, she could have easily chosen the defector's assistance."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: '...No particular reason. We just hold different principles toward things.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory305.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teasell', 3: '...Tsk. Righteousness and justice?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teasell', 3: '...Do you think they exist in this world?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teasell', 3: 'Were the things you experienced... not enough to open your eyes?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teasell', 3: 'Only power is eternal. You can only achieve the things you said if you have power.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teasell', 3: "Ha... What a naive child. Go if you want. I won't stop you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teasell', 3: "You'll die in the righteousness and justice you so insist one day.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory346.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Echo', 3: 'He and I are seeking different things.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You claimed you're not Lena...", 3: '45'}
{2: "...Yet all you've said just now is from Lena's perspective?", 3: '46'}
{3: 'Echo never fails to look melancholic when she mentions Lena.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I met Lena back in Utopia... but she didn't defect, and I never used her identity to collaborate with any defectors, either.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'She helped me tremendously and taught me a lot when I was in Utopia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'All I want to do is destroy Utopia and... find Lena.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Do you have information on Lena?', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "We got separated when we escaped, but I'm sure she didn't die. She told me she would escape...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Lena was a member of Caribou, which was a squad directly under Nikola's command. You have only heard that each member had different identities, but no one has ever known the truth."}
{3: "Is Nikola aware of Lena's disappearance?"}
{3: 'How did Echo replace Lena and enter Constellia? Why is she so desperate to find Lena now?'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "...I didn't clarify it in the beginning because I would sound guilty no matter how I described it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'But everything will be clear once we find Utopia.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '62', 4: 'This still sounds like an empty promise.', 5: '62'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "...I'm sorry I can't offer you more right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'But I know that Babylonia probably wants to take advantage of my identity as a test subject.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Justice is bound to echo through the land. When Utopia is destroyed and the Aurora Squadron receives their deserving demise, I will go to Babylonia with you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'That is... if we uphold our current alliance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I know Utopia has been researching the M.I.N.D., but I didn't know that he was capable of this already.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Recalling the weapon you encountered during the previous fight... you have indeed never heard of something that can directly interfere with a Construct's M.I.N.D."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'I need you to connect to me to stabilize my M.I.N.D. so we can enter Utopia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "As for the questions you have on Lena, me, and Aurora Squadron... I'll slowly tell you everything, just like I promised.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Your terminal buzzes againâ€”it's Lee's message. He has checked the surroundings and confirmed that Echo is not intentionally leading you to Kurono's trap."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I don't need you to trust me. We're just using each other to get what we need.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The purple-haired girl's eyes glisten with resolve."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "You'll get the intel on Utopia and the Kurono test subject, and I... will find Lena and destroy Utopia.", 4: '1'}
{2: "...My stance hasn't changed.", 3: '77', 4: '...A pleasure working with you.', 5: '79'}
{2: 'I reserve my right to contact Babylonia before this is over.', 3: '78'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "That's fine by me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You interrupt Echo seemingly just before she is about to make a speech.'}
{3: 'From the information you have gathered so far, there is an unquestionable connection between Echo, Aurora Squadron, and the flying fortress named Utopia.'}
{3: "Any new information you can get from her will certainly help Asimov's and your plan."}
{3: 'And how... will Project Winter and Aurora Squadron be linked?'}
{2: 'When we stop to rest tonight...', 3: '84'}
{2: 'Tell me your "story" then.', 3: '85'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "...That's... going to be a long one.", 4: '1'}
